body.name: Air Purifiers for Bedroom HEPA Air Purifier With Aromatherapy Function For Pet Smoke Pollen Dander Hair Smell 20dB Air Cleaner For Bedroom Office Living Room Kitchen (Air PurifierZHIBO-C30-1pack)

features: High Circulation Rate: Enjoy clean and fresh air with air purifier! Using advanced air spiral technology and 360-degree inlets, it refreshes the air per hour in spaces up to 215 sq ft/20 sq m. Experience a 25% increase in purification efficiency for a healthier and more comfortable living environment.

20 dB Low-Noise Operation: Our air purifier operates at just 20dB when in sleep mode, thanks to its reduced fan speed. Even though it's quietly working hard to filter the air, you'll hardly notice its presence. Enjoy a peaceful and calm indoor environment with our low-noise air purifier.

Enjoy Fragrant Air: Enhance your indoor air with your favorite scent by adding 4-5 drops of essential oil to the top aromatherapy pad. The fragrance will circulate throughout the room with the fresh air, providing not only a healthy and comfortable environment but also a pleasant aroma for you and your family to enjoy.

Efficiency Filtration: Air purifier is equipped with HEPA filters that meet high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) standards, ensuring efficient filtration of smoke, pollen, dander, hair, and more. By turning on the purifier, you can improve the quality of your indoor air and enjoy a healthier life.

Notice: Our air purifiers are equipped with a filter replacement reminder that will turn on the "Replacement" light after 2000 hours of use. To ensure the health of you and your family, we suggest replacing the filter cartridge every 3-6 months. Please note that the air purifier has a voltage of 120V and is only suitable for use in the United States.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay but no replacement filters
reviews.reviewText: I can not for the life of me find a replacement filter for this unit. It works decent for the price just sad it seems very disposable. Once the filter is too far gone I’ll try and rig up my own filter but I doubt it will work. I might try washing the filter once it’s extremely dirty.
